channel.title: PBScape Devolopment Team
channel.description:
PBScape
Base
The base is Deltascape. The server is mainly coded by me and "Unknown". Unknown was the old source coder / owner but he decided to stop hosting so he gave me his source.
Why do you need a team? To be very honest i don't like working solo i find it very boring and i don't get along with the word "solo" im a person that has to work as a team than solo so hope this answer your question
VPS/HOST I recently bought my VPS and we are on VPS right now and runnning :D
Goal Well.. my main goal is to just get the server fully completed and get some players..
Skills Atm all skills are coded and are working.
Update log August the 29th - Made new home August the 29st - Added some commands August the 30st - Fixed ::players August the 31st - added ::onlinestaff / ::playerlist August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st - August the 31st -
Pictures
[URL=http://img521.imageshack.us/i/pbscape1copy.jpg/][IMG]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/3702/pbscape1copy.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img269.imageshack.us/i/pbscape2copy.jpg/][IMG]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/6752/pbscape2copy.jpg[/img][/URL] [url=http://img827.imageshack.us/i/pbscape4.jpg/][img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/909/pbscape4.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://img828.imageshack.us/i/pbscape5.jpg/][img]http://img828.imageshack.us/img828/9268/pbscape5.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://img843.imageshack.us/i/pbscape6.jpg/][img]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/7909/pbscape6.jpg[/img][/url]
Apply to join
Name: Age: Email: MSN: How long have you been around java?: Spot: Source coder Client coder Web devolopment : How many hours can you spend?:

item.title: PBScape Devolopment Team
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Try not to post undates on commands, atleast not simple ones.

[quote=“Java Is So Cool, post:2, topic:358008”]Sorry for this but shitty, there I said it everybody can agree. But noone really wants to say it. I’m sorry, really DeltaScape servers never get more then 5 players then lag like shyt.

EDIT: Nice paradiseX source.[/quote]I’d rather see a Delta than a PI based server.

Read full topic
